markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Sea of Thought](/Spells.aspx?ID=1162)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 106

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Thoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=524)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Area** 15-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
Fortitude

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You cover the area in a sloshing torrent of semi-solidified thought, roughly ankle high. The area becomes difficult terrain, similarly to a shallow bog. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the shifting waves of thought. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

---
**Heightened (+1)** The radius of the spell's area increases by 5 feet.
name: Sea of Thought

text: Sea of Thought Two Actions Source Dark Archive pg. 106 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deity Thoth Cast somatic, verbal Range 60 feet Area 15-foot burst Saving Throw Fortitude Duration 1 minute --- You cover the area in a sloshing torrent of semi-solidified thought, roughly ankle high. The area becomes difficult terrain, similarly to a shallow bog. Each round that a creature starts its turn in the area, it must attempt a Fortitude save against the shifting waves of thought. On a failure, it takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it leaves the area, and on a critical failure, it is also knocked prone. --- Heightened (+1) The radius of the spell's area increases by 5 feet.
